title: Planting area and production decreased for winter-triticeae crops but increased for rapeseed in Ukraine with climatic impacts dominating
content:
Publication date: Available online 7 September 2024

Source: Geography and Sustainability

Author(s): Jichong Han, Yuchuan Luo, Zhao Zhang, Jialu Xu, Yi Chen, Senthold Asseng, Jonas Jägermeyr, Christoph Müller, Jørgen E Olesen, Reimund Rötter, Fulu Tao
